meaning: It is actually not doing your stuff
story: When a lady get into a taxi, she start getting mad and yelling to the driver to drive faster. The driver keep reply the lady as "helping you" in a claim tone. The contradiction between lady and driver are interesting. So people would like to use "helping you" when someone request their help
